name: Phone with Smart AI Assistant
description: This phone features an intelligent AI assistant that learns your habits to provide personalized help through natural language processing. It seamlessly integrates into your daily life to enhance every aspect of your mobile experience.

name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Experience exceptional audio quality with these Bluetooth headphones featuring active noise cancellation to immerse you completely in your music or calls.

name: Smart Robot Vacuum
description: This app-controlled robot vacuum makes cleaning efficient with customized schedules, selective room cleaning, and advanced navigation.

name: 360 Camera Drone
description: Capture stunning aerial panoramic footage in 4K with this easy-to-fly drone featuring collision detection and auto return home.

name: Fitness Tracker Watch
description: Stay on top of your health and fitness goals with this stylish smartwatch that tracks heart rate, sleep, activity and more.

name: Smart Display Speaker
description: Listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks on this WiFi and Bluetooth speaker while accessing your virtual assistant and viewing visual info like calendar events and weather forecasts.

name: VR Gaming Headset
description: Dive into incredible virtual worlds, play your favorite games in a whole new way and enjoy an immersive media experience with this advanced VR headset.

name: 360 Camera
description: Capture the full panoramic view in stunning detail with this easy-to-use 360 camera featuring built-in image stabilization.

name: Smart Baby Monitor
description: Keep an eye on your little one with this WiFi baby monitor allowing you to view and listen from your phone, get alerts and access advanced analytics.

name: Kids Tablet
description: Designed just for kids, this durable tablet has parental controls and access to over 20,000 popular books, learning apps, games and videos screened for age-appropriateness.

name: Laptop with Stylus
description: Power through projects on the go with this lightweight laptop featuring a touchscreen display for natural writing and drawing with the pressure-sensitive stylus.

name: Mirrorless Camera
description: Take professional-quality photos and videos without the bulk using this mirrorless digital camera that delivers speedy autofocus and expanded creative options.

name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: Tune in to exceptional JBL sound without distractions using these Bluetooth earbuds with active noise cancellation and an adaptive listening experience.

name: Foldable Smartphone
description: Stay productive and entertained anywhere with this sleek foldable touchscreen smartphone featuring stylish design, versatile usage modes and the latest innovative features.

name: Smart Security Camera
description: Monitor your home day and night using this full HD indoor/outdoor security camera with intelligent alerts, facial recognition and easy smartphone viewing.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Experience exceptional sound quality on the go with these Bluetooth earbuds providing up to 24 hours total listening time with the included wireless charging case.
